title: Drawing, "Sketches from South America A. Details of animals.  B. Donkey.  Fence. C. Plants.", September 2, 1853
markings:
Recto:  Stamped in ink, at lower left: Lugt 457c
Verso:  Stamped in ink, at center right:  Lugt 457d
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, at top left: rich pink; again, at upper center: splendid rose / deep; and at bottom left:  Pride of the mountains / leaves rich dark green / with light bluish green tops / [Aug is struck out]  Sept 2d .
description: Horizontal view of a branch, a tree, and a tree top at left of sheet.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Sketches from South America A. Details of animals.  B. Donkey.  Fence. C. Plants.", September 2, 1853.
September 2, 1853. Graphite on cream-colored paper. Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-119-c.
